name: ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment
about: What it is: Kate Somerville's #1 best-selling facial treatment. Triple-action exfoliator smooths skin and improves the appearance of pores in just 2 minutes...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Skintone, Pores, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles..Formulation: Scrub..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Papaya, Pineapple, and Pumpkin Enzymes: Naturally enhance skin exfoliation without overdrying..- Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, and Silica: Lactic and salicylic acid provide chemical exfoliation while natural ingredient silica works to physically exfoliate dead skin cells from the surface..- Aloe Vera, Honey, and Vitamin E: Help smooth and soften skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Three types of exfoliations (chemical, physical and enzymatic) and three treatments in one (mask, scrub and peel). ExfoliKate  Intensive Exfoliating Treatment reveals glowing skin in two minutes. This facial removes dead, dry skin to reveal healthy, radiant, younger-looking skin...Kate Somerville has partnered with Foster Nation to support foster youth as they age out of the system, providing professional training, workshops and mentorship, and fully funding 5+ cosmetology scholarships annually to support professional beauty career paths. For more information about Foster Nation, visit kateso.co/givingback...Clinical Results:.After just one use*:.- 94% showed highly significant improvement in skin texture..-97% showed highly significant improvement in the appearance of pores...After 4 weeks*:.-100% showed highly significant improvement in the appearance of crowu2019s feet, fine lines and wrinkles..*Results based on an independent clinical study.
ingredients: -Papaya, Pineapple, and Pumpkin Enzymes: Naturally enhance skin exfoliation without overdrying..-Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, and Silica: Lactic and salicylic acid provide chemical exfoliation while natural ingredient silica works to physically exfoliate dead skin cells from the surface..-Aloe Vera, Honey, and Vitamin E: Help smooth and soften skin... Aqua/Water/Eau, Lactic Acid, Silica, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Pectin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Salicylic Acid, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Ferment Extract, Alcohol Denat., Sorbic Acid, Cinnamal, Mel/Honey/Miel, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Eugenol, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Linalool, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Beta-Carotene, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Bromelain, Papain, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cinnamomum Cassia Leaf Oil, Acetic Acid, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, CI 75810 (Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use once or twice a week AM or PM. .-Apply a thin, even layer to a clean, wet face, massaging in a circular motion for 30 seconds. .-Leave on for up to two minutes. .-Rinse and gently pat dry. .-This product may cause the skin to tingle and flush slightly for a short time.

reviews.review_title: Instant glow, smoother skin, and a mini facial
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment as part of my skincare routine, and itu2019s become a game-changer for my skin. I use this treatment 1u20132 times a week after cleansing. I apply a small amount to damp skin, gently massaging it in circular motions for about 30 seconds, avoiding the eye area. Then, I let it sit for another 1u20132 minutes before rinsing it off with warm water. Itu2019s quick and easy to incorporate into my routine, and it doesnu2019t add much extra time. It feels a little intense but not overwhelming. The scent is herbal and spa-like, which makes the experience feel luxurious. Right after using it, my skin feels incredibly smooth, clean, and soft. I notice an immediate glow and reduction in dullness, like Iu2019ve just had a mini facial at home.Over time, my skin texture has noticeably improved. It feels more refined, and Iu2019ve seen a reduction in tiny bumps and uneven areas. While itu2019s powerful, I wouldnu2019t recommend it for extremely sensitive skin because of its active exfoliating ingredients. But if your skin can handle it, this product delivers on its promises. Itu2019s definitely worth the investment!

reviews.review_title: Good for a once in a while exfoliation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard of this product for years and mixed reviews of it being perfect and some saying itu2019s too strong. I think for me it works great as a once in a while exfoliating treatment. The key is to only use a very small amount and only for the short two minutes it directs. If you have sensitive skin, starting with a shorter duration could even be beneficial. I found my skin to be very smooth and exfoliated after using this product. Iu2019ll definitely keep using this and will consider rebuying. One thing I didnu2019t know about this is the color and scent. I did not know it was such a green color. Neat plus you can tell how much youu2019ve actually put on. The scent is almost a leafy green scent with a bit of mint or acid to it. Not something I would necessarily want to smell like but it does smell like an effective skincare product. Equating this scent to the taste of food, itu2019s like when you taste a food and can tell itu2019s good for you. On the packaging, I think the tube option is a good choice to keep it air tight. Also the smiley face is cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment delivers instant results for glowing, smoother skin in just two minutes. The product has a spa-like feel with its refreshing scent and gentle tingle, making it a treat to use. After one application, my skin felt softer, brighter, and more radiant. Perfect for weekly use to maintain a glowing complexion! Highly recommend for anyone seeking improved texture and minimized pores.

reviews.review_title: Great with some adjustments to usage instructions

The combination is pretty good at lifting dead cells and improving skin texture. My skin looks extra smooth and glowy the morning after using it. It can be harsh on sensitive skin but with some tweaking, Iu2019m able to use it up to twice a week with no irritation. Instruction is to massage on skin for 30 secs then leave on for 2. That seems excessive for me. This product stays on my skin for less than a minute. I see benefits so thatu2019s how I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

First time I used this was long time ago, it says leave on for 2 mins, then rinse off. My stubborn self thought hmm maybe longer will do better results, so I think I left it on for 5-10 mins, god no, don't ever do that, because it tingled so bad, I have anxiety when washing my face at the sink so that didn't help with the cloth, rough... skin felt like it was on fire and looked pinkish-red due to the over exfoliation time, then went for a jog with the puppy outside in the winter over the holidays, the wind didn't help, looked like wind burn but wasn't. lol. I learnt from that big time, other than that horrible first experience of mine years ago, I learnt & only leave it on for 2 minutes then rinse, i only use it in the shower, not only exfoliates the surface but it really penetrates and gets under the surface, cleans your pores, gets the guck trapped in there, lifts it out. leaves your face feeling fresh, so soft, so clean.

I was left with a ton of pustules, my cheeks were swollen, and now sensitive redness and texture are left behind.  I really hope I don't have lasting scaring from this. My skin isn't usually particularly sensitive but I don't think I'll reach for this ever again.  Please see photos.

reviews.review_text: Kate Somerville gifted me this product to test, honest opinions are my own.  Yes the ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment is expensive at $98/2oz but worth every penny. I love how it gently removes dead skin cells to not only bring out a healthy glow but also create a wonderful base for skincare to be even more effective and makeup to apply more evenly.  After just a few uses, I saw improvement in my pores, texture of my skin and fine lines.   100% recommend for anyone looking to improve skin texture.

reviews.review_text: I love Kate Somerville, their products are such high-quality and work well with my acne prone skin. I have combination skin type, and the dry areas of my face are often flaky. reviews.review_text: Hey Beauties!   #KateSommervilleSkincareGiftedMe their ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment!   Inspired by the #1 treatment at her Hollywood clinic, Kateu2019s holy grail scrub is packed with AHAs and Fruit Enzymes to deliver three types of exfoliation; chemical, physical and enzymatic for glowing skin in two minutes. By sloughing away dead skin cells from the surface, skin is prepped to better absorb the rest of your regimen. Use twice a week to see visibly improved texture, pores and radiance.    Key Ingredients: Papaya, Pineapple, and Pumpkin Enzymes~ Provide enzymatic exfoliation, digesting dead skin cells to reveal natural glowing skin.    AHA Lactic Acid, & BHA Salicylic Acid~ Chemically exfoliate, working to loosen the u201cglueu201d between dead skin cells.    Silica~ Natural bead to physically exfoliate dead skin cells from the surface    Aloe Vera, Honey, and Vitamin E~ Help smooth and soften skin.   This beauty packs a punch! This exfoliating treatment really sloughs away those dead skin cells. Since, I'm very sensitive I use this once a week or every other week. I have noticed a huge improvement in the texture of my skin since I've started using this.   This product is formulated without Mineral Oil, Parabens, Phthalates, SLES or SLS and Synthetic Fragrances.   @KateSomervilleSkincare~ ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment

I usually just do it while Iu2019m in the shower and shave my legs or whatever while Iu2019m letting it sit. reviews.review_text: I have purchased the mini version of this product and this is a POTENT AND EFFECTIVE deeply exfoliating TREATMENT. Upon application, it stung a little and after washing it off my face was RED. I recommend applying Marula oil (or any other deeply hydrating oil) followed by a moisturizer (I used my Moon Juice moisturizer). The next day my face was still slightly pink but my skin was so so smooth, and all my blackheads that were hurried deep down were now at the surface ready for easy extraction (gross I know). However this is the ONLY product that helped me resurface my skin and not break me out. Yes the irritation was there (no this is not your hydrafacial spa treatment) but the results are amazing and my skin looked really good, smooth and with less texture on the second and third day. I highly recommend this product if you willing to accept the burn and exfoliation. I have tried other exfoliators such as goop, dr jart microdermabrasion, Paulas Choice BHA (which is completely ineffective itu2019s just PR), Tara harper, the ordinary peel, COSRX, countless mud masks, etc etc but nothing gave me the deep clean results as this product. reviews.review_title: Decent but too small for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is alright. Is it the best exfoliator Iu2019ve tried? Absolutely not. Is there a huge difference? No yet, BUT it also didnu2019t breakout/hurt/destroy my (currently) ridiculously sensitive skin. For an exfoliator? I count that as a win.  In addition, I found the smell to not be overwhelming (extremely important for me with skincare), and a little goes a long wayu2026because it has no choice (*in the case of the mini). Let me explain:   The mini, whewu2026this is not worth $25. The amount of product is, honestly, what Iu2019d expect from one of the Bazaar Rewards (maybe like a 250 pointer/500 in a kit). You need to use a little because if you donu2019t, youu2019d absolutely be wasting your money. Iu2019d say wait for a sale, or get a sample in store if possible before committing. Itu2019s definitely not a HG for me personally. Iu2019d say if you can commit to the larger size during a sale, go for it. Itu2019s good for sensitive skin, the smell isnu2019t overwhelming at all and just because it isnu2019t my HG does not mean it wonu2019t be yours. For these reasons, I still recommend it. Just not at the mini size (just not enough product to get the full picture for results, in my opinion).   I personally will continue to only use it once a week (though the packaging does say twice is acceptable).   (I included the mini size next to a pen for size)

I don't know how I stumbled onto the Kate Somerville website where I read up on the product and found that you should use it AFTER a cleanser. I can't imagine I'm the only person who didn't realize this. I used and my acne was at least 50% better the next morning. It managed to clear up the redness, marks, and bumps in a lot of places. I'll be doing this 2x a week. I cannot recommend this enough for acne!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini size, and yes it burns, and it burns pretty badly, and I don't have sensitive skin at all. However, it only burns for like 30 secs, and I found that after I make it past that point, my face gets used to it and it's only a slight tingle. I usually leave it on for 5 min without even realizing it because it doesn't burn once I get past that initial 30 secs. After I take it off, my face is sooo soft and smooth! This mask is amazing! Honestly, if you want something that'll actually fix your skin's texture and resurface your face, and actually effect some real change, you'll probably have to endure some discomfort. As soon as I take it off, my face isn't red at all, and all the tingling is gone. It definitely gives results worth a few mins of tingling! I've used it for a few weeks, twice a week, and I can absolutely see a difference. All the darker spots on my chin from past acne are looking better, all the blemishes on my face are gone, and overall my skin looks brighter and healthier. I literally feel like it's burning away the old, damaged layers of skin slowly, and I'm growing new healthier skin in its place! Everyone should, at least, give the mini size a try! I will 100% definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, I don't like to spend a ton of money on skincare. Most of my products are from Trader Joe's or Target and they work well for me. I have very carefully curated an inexpensive but effective skincare regimen. This is the only product that I cannot, and will not, replace. It is absolutely a must in my cabinet. I don't have a lot of disposable income and the price tag guts me every time but IT IS SO WORTH IT. A little product goes a long way, and since it is a bit of a more intensive exfoliating treatment, I don't need to use it with extreme frequency and it actually lasts me quite a while. My skin always feels so soft and smooth after I use it, and I personally love the way it smells. Since I started using this product my skin has become so much more clear and my dark spots have faded. It takes a few months for full cell turnover but it's very clearly effective. If you're on the fence about trying it, or the price tag causes you to pause, I can assure you it is worth it to at least try the travel size. You really won't regret it. I never have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hey guys, so I was looking for a great exfoliator because I had been dealing with some breakouts and scarring. I have always had clear skin so when I started experiencing my breakouts, I felt subconscious and wanted to do something about it. I started to drink more water and eat better as I feel that these are two important steps to take, then I updated my skin care routine. I purchased the mini size exfoliator and decided to give it a try. When I first used it, I felt a little tingle as I rubbed it on my face but I liked the feeling. Then, I let it sit on my face and finally washed it off. My face felt clean and had a glow so I was impressed but still had to continue to use it to see if my acne and hyperpigmentation got better. Now I have been using this exfoliator for two months and my skin looks and feels amazing. In the beginning, I used this product once a week but now I use it every four days. Most of my dark spots faded away and I do not have as many breakouts as I had before. I am happy that I found something that actually worked for my combination skin type because I truly feel better about my skin. It is pricey but a little goes along way and honestly Iu2019m not cheap with myself so whatever baby wants, baby GETS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s true what they say! I noticed immediate results and you can feel it working instantly. Great product! My skin is so soft and pores reduced. I like the smell also.

Iu2019ll give it a rest and try to use it again maybe my skin will adjust? reviews.review_text: Best facial exfoliating treatment ever. I use this once a week and my skin is instantly better. Itu2019s a mini facial in a shower. Blemishes are gone and I feel super clean without feeling dried or stripped. Hands down the best facial scrub in history. It seems expensive but trust me this is worth every penny and I will buy this for the rest of my life. I have been using this product for over 4 years and I have only had to buy it twice it lasts forever. All I need is once a week and you only need to use a little bit and it does itu2019s job. 10/10 best thing ever. I rarely recommend stuff and always read reviews before I purchase expensive anything, so I thought I would write and help others like me who are on the fence with this product.

reviews.review_title: Fab but Overpriced - Buy PTR Instead

reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of this - I'm a sample queen and LOVE skincare. Personally I'm a huge fan of combo physical & chemical exfoliants. Although I did really like this product, the physical exfoliation of this left me wanting more. I will say that my skin still felt hydrated afterwards which was nice. But above all, the price in NO WAY justifies the product. There are so many other combo physical & chemical exfoliants out there. My personal favourite is the Peter Thomas Roth Pumpkin Enzyme. Less than half the price for 5oz, in comparison to this. Also have recently tried the Pixie Peel & Polish. Please just don't think this is your only option! A great moisturizer to follow an exfoliating treatment is your best friend. First Aid Beauty is a great one for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find the mix of physical and chemical exfoliants to be ideal for my skinu2019s needs. I use it every 2-3 days, and Iu2019m seeing a reduction in pore size and texture/bumps. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this from Sephora and totally fell in love! I have very sensitive, combo skin and this exfoliator is perfect - effective yet non-irritating. It feels like it has very fine physical exfoliant texture to it as well as a tingle which makes the think thereu2019s a chemical component to it as well. It smells pretty strongly of clove and cinnamon to me - reminds me of a holiday candle. The scent doesnu2019t linger on skin after rinse which is nice. This quick (3minutes or less) exfoliator have a somewhat cooling sensation after removal and left my skin soft - not dry. You donu2019t need to use a lot to get a great result. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Your face looks like a glazed donut.

reviews.review_text: When in my mid 20's, I worked for Anthropologie once upon a time before I was into skincare and everyone freaked out when we got the news we would be carrying the ExfoliKate. I tried it...tingly, but not being into skincare and not paying close attention to my skin I thought it was just meh, especially for the price. It ran out and I never bothered getting more. Fast forward to early 30's (combo-oily skin) lurking on reddit during 'rona and WHOAWHOAWHOA. I am a grown woman now and this has a place in my life. This will definitely be a product I stock up on on payday. There's truly nothing like it. It's gritty and to me it packs a punch but after two uses you get used to it (especially since you only leave it on for 2 min). I definitely took to Instagram to brag about my skin and my friend told me my skin looked like a glazed donut. So goodbye bury me, make sure the mortician uses ExfoliKate.

reviews.review_title: Pore clearing, nourishing and hydrating! Love it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am addicted to using this facial scrub/mask!!!! Itu2019s so hard for me to find a comfortable exfoliator! My skin is dry and somewhat sensitive so anything that strips it of itu2019s natural oils makes my skin very dehydrated! Most of the facial scrubs Iu2019ve tried so far contained clay which is the most drying ingredient you can use in your skin. I received this in my Allure box and looked up the ingredients immediately. Iu2019ve never heard of it before so I was very interested in trying it. I love all of the ingredients, except for 1: alcohol denation. I am still unclear as to what this ingredient would do to my skin but I read that it causes dryness, irritation and acne. Well, Iu2019ve used this exfoliator around 4 times now and my skin feels and looks amazing after using it. So, perhaps it contains a very small amount? I think this mask would be PERFECT without that ingredients. Pumpkin enzymes are one of the best ingredients for exfoliating the skin without stripping it and it contains honey, an antibacterial and nourishing ingredient! Itu2019s not harsh, at all and it actually feels a bit moisturizing! Thereu2019s no fine grains that are harsh. It has a creamy texture. You leave it on for 2 minutes after exfoliating to let the product do itu2019s worth. Thatu2019s really great if you donu2019t have the time to do a facial mask!!! I do want to buy this and give it a longer trial run just to make sure that the denatured alcohol wonu2019t cause skin issues and I am very thankful that this comes in a sample size!! I recommend it for anybody!!

reviews.review_text: This stuff is magic! I have combo, textured skin with acne   lots of acne scars and I find that this leaves my skin softer and smoother and with less texture than any other product I've ever tried. It also helps keep my acne at bay and leaves me with a really lovely glow. Just make sure to use a good moisturizer afterwards because it can can be a bit drying. I like to use regular grocery store coconut oil after this exfoliator. I usually go for the mini size, because the large one takes me ages to get through and my wallet cringes at having to drop over $100 (CAD) on one skincare product. I usually find that the mini size takes about 2 months to go through if I use it 1x a week, and 1 month if I use it 2x a week. It's expensive but I find that it's worth its price.  Just a tip: Once you've used up quite a bit and you're starting to have trouble squeezing the product out, cut the top off of the tube off, and then use a clip (like a small bull clip or even a bobby pin) to close the top and prevent the product from drying out. You  can use your fingers to scoop out the product, and re-clip for the next use. This way, you can get every last bit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne-prone skin which is otherwise pretty sturdy and this mask does the trick for me. It always leaves my skin feeling super smooth and glowing. I use it in the shower and leave it on for two minutes while conditioning my hair.   Be warned - if you have sensitive skin, this is not the product for you. It does sting for a minute and may be too intense of an exfoliant for some.   I'd also like to point out that the reformulated product no longer contains polyethylene (those harmful microbeads.) This a statement made by Kate Somerville: Due to a recent federal ban on the use of polyethylene beads in cosmetic products beginning in 2017, we have replaced the polyethylene beads in ExfoliKate Intensive with natural silica. We did extensive testing to determine that silica delivered the same amazing benefits as polyethylene beads without consumers perceiving the change.   The current ingredients list now reflects this change.  I noticed the first reviews coming up were concerns about the use of polyethylene. It would be a shame if someone were deterred from using this product because of a 4 year old review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: If you're impatient like me -- look no further
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I don't know what kind of magical wizard is making this stuff, but my skin has never felt so happy. I have drawers and cabinets full of skin products that have never come close to doing what this stuff did for me in 2 minutes. I have combo skin with congestion, dullness, and large pores as my main issues. After washing this off for the first time my skin felt baby smooth... but 5 minutes later the magic happened. When I looked at my skin it was like I could actually SEE it for the first time. My pores were smaller and any blackheads/congestion I had were obvious and therefore easily removed. I was freaking GLOWING! I've never glown before! Also, as someone with ADHD, skincare has been tough for me my whole life because getting myself to do routine, everyday tasks without immediate rewards feel like torture. A lot of skincare takes time and consistency -- the very two things I struggle with. Getting immediate results like this is a game changer for me. It's motivating and exciting and I WANT to do my skincare routine every night. I will be penniless because now I want to buy all the other products...but at least I'll be glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this product was more like a 3.5 star product for me. I've used both this and Drunk Elephant's babyfacial and hands down the latter is the better product for me.  I've now used exfolikate twice and there's a couple of issues I'm having with it. One it that it burns like crazy. I expected a bit of burning but it was unbearable to the point I could barely leave it on for 1 minute let alone 2 full minutes. Second issue being that is way more drying than babyfacial. My face felt tense and tight afterwards (good in some ways, not so good in others). Third is that perhaps due to the intensity of this product, I did find myself breaking out ever so slightly.  I also didn't find that it helped at all with pores. All in all, would not use this twice a week as recommended.  That all said, save for the burning, it isn't enough for me to return this product per se. I would recommend only using it in the summer (the harsh dry winter air left me feeling even more dried out after exfolikate) and if you have sensitive skin definitely look for the exfolikate gentle or even better, upgrade to Drunk Elephant. The good? It does work in resurfacing the skin and giving you a dewy look (again, not as nice of a glow as with Drunk Elephant). It also takes very little product for a treatment. If you follow up with a hyper hydrating moisturizer or oil it alleviates some of the issues I had with it drying me out. I could see this being great for the neck/decollete area.   Not be to be a broken record but tbh, if Drunk Elephant hadn't come up with babyfacial, I would probably love this product. It's just hard to have a direct comparison to a product that works better for me.

reviews.review_text: I am a skincare JUNKIE. I have used everything, from high end SUPER expensive products to drugstore brands. This stuff right here - I have tried others but I ALWAYS return to this exfoliating treatment.  A little background: I grew up with normal skin, rarely breakout, not super dry not super oily. Then I hit 25 and my face took a TURN. I became incredibly dry, which led me to breakout and have horrible dry patches to the point my skin was flaking and it was awful wearing makeup because everything would just sit on top of the flakes. My esthetician told me that exfoliating, even though I was already dry, would really really help me with the dryness I was experiencing. Cue Kate Somerville Exfolikate. I used this ONE time and I have never ever looked back. It does tingle, but ultimately it eats away at that dead layer of skin you have, leaving my skin free of flakes.   I know its expensive, but I PROMISE you a little goes a long way and this will change your life if you are experiencing any dryness/acne issues. I've been using this for two years and will never go back to anything else.

I used it for 3 days in a row and left on longer than recommended and soooo many comedones came out when I used my extractor including one that had been in my cheek for 2 months. I am so very happy and glad I finally took the plunge and bought it. Will NEVER be without Kate again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry and sensitive skin for the most part, and I need to exfoliate regularly to make sure there is no dead skin on my face, so I was excited to try this product and hoped it would work. However, the exact opposite happened. This product immediately felt like I was setting my skin on fire, so of course I took it off. While it obviously took off the dead skin, the product was not kind on my skin the next few days. The first day my skin was very discolored and red, and my skin looked so dry it almost appeared to be of scar tissue texture. I applied bag balm multiple times to try and moisturize those areas but the result of this exfoliating treatment was still clear as day. The second day I woke up and my skin was literally flaking off of my face. Not worth buying for anyone with dry or sensitive skin, donu2019t do that to your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This would have been half a star if I could have given it. It has EVERYTHING to make sensitive skin a brilliant, splotchy, red. Then peel. Wheee! As soon as I smelled the top note (so cute) of CLOVES I had a really bad feeling. I mean, clove oil is used for toothaches and in some of the things your dentist uses. ON  my face??? Yeah, I did it anyway. I do use it for my chest area, so it's not a total loss. Wheee.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was told to try this by a Sephora employee due to blotchy dry patches of skin that I was having during the winter months about 2 years ago, and I am glad I gave it a go. I always have a 2oz and a 0.5oz bottle of this handy! It makes my skin feel baby soft and smells so good. Overall it has made an incredible difference on my combination, acne prone, sensitive skin like I could not believe!! I did not believe there was anything out there for me until I found this!  I have recommended this to so many friends and gotten them hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has honestly never been as healthy and clear as it was when I was using this product. Never going without it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. Love this product, I always see a difference in my skin after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this on myself and it revealed little whiteheads I didnu2019t even know I had (and Iu2019m very thorough about keeping my skin clear). BUT I used this on my husband and WOW. Heu2019s had blackheads in his nose for YEARS that Iu2019ve never been able to get out. Once he used this, they literally just slid out like butter. Maybe gross, but this is a true testament to how good this product is.

reviews.review_title: Worth the money!  Game changer.  Different.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a monthly box, and now buying a tube. This exfoliator is a GAME CHANGER!  I am 45 years old, and this made my skin feel like a baby's! Dullness gone.  I used it in the shower, so it was easy to rinse thoroughly.    I had tried other exfoliators (Bobbi Brown, Murad), but they didn't seem to work AT ALL for me.  I noticed a difference with ExfoliKate after just one use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty sure this cleared up my mystery acne. I've been having moderately bad (I went from 1-3 active spots, to 5-10 active always) acne for the last year. Been trying everything to clear it up, washing my face reliably, using differn, trying serums. Nope, nothing, I'd always have active acne on my cheeks.   Well, I just started using this, and bam. My face is already looking much better (used about 2 weeks now). I typically use it in the shower, twice a weekish. I don't have especially sensitive skin, but the first time I used it it was especially tingly, much less so now. I don't mind the smell, and my face is always super soft after.  It's expensive, but I can't complain too much if it solves my acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know what Kate Somerville had to trade with the devil to make this, but Iu2019m glad it happened. Iu2019ve always used exfoliaters on my face, but this takes it to a new level. My thirty year old combo (pregnant) skin has never looked better - after one treatment it was noticeably clearer, dark spots minimized, and pores looking non-existent. There are very few products that I will ever be without and this is one of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I have never used an exfoliating product that changed my skin after one use! Before I get into that, I am obsessed with the way this product smells and the dark green color of the product makes my heart happy. I received a sample of this by recommendation and used it in the shower. I didnu2019t have any makeup on to remove. The next day when I woke up, I was eager to check out my face. My skin was SO smooth and the texture along my jawline was almost completely gone! I am in such amazement. I never would have believed you if if I was told this product would get rid of my texture so quickly. Now I want to purchase the full size because I donu2019t know that I can be without this exfoliator! Donu2019t try this unless you want to fall in love- itu2019s pretty much guaranteed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh. This is amazing. Itu2019s a tingling face wash but the results are amazing. My face has never felt so smooth! Any acne that I have will be gone within the next day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great chemical exfoliator, I like to try and make sure to use it before a mud mask/ other mask to really deep clean and clear my skin at the surface to maximize a mask's effectiveness. It can really sting though, leave your skin extra sensitive to the sun, plus it's crazy expensive for my college student budget. If you have the money it's worth it, if you don't the mini size also lasts a decently long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a Sephora favorites box and wow is it amazing. I even went and purchased a back up!! I have dry skin but I still have small patches of texture on my cheeks. When I first applied this it burned so bad I swore to never use it again. But when I rinced my face and applied my moisturizers I saw instant results!! Texture was gone!! I even have my husband using it now! Iu2019ll buy this again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product !! I stopped using it for a couple of weeks and my face was not happy , this gives you a tingly sensation when it is applied to the skin ; you can tell it's working . I have severe acne and with this product I was able to minimize them - I have the cleanser the exfoli-kate and the moisturizer my face has not felt or looked this good in years

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Slight tingle from then enzymes, which I love bechabise it feels like it actually is working. I worked into my t zone that seems to be my problem area for blackheads.it  left my pores  clearer and pores appeared much smaller. Would recommend for oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in a beauty subscription box and I love it. I use it once or twice a week and it keeps my skin smooth and clear. Itu2019s crazy expensive but my little 1.4 oz tube has lasted for 6 months, so maybe itu2019s not so bad. I will still have to budget for this purchase but I would say itu2019s worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would compare this to the DE Baby facial.  I think it works just as well and only takes 2 mins, instead of 15-20. It does burn a bit like the DE one.  It is also a little more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  First, it smells fantastic.  Spicy, kind of cinnamon-y.  Second, I need a mask I can use in the shower, on wet skin.  I'm not good about washing my face to smear stuff on it and then wash it again, so this is great for me to keep my skin a bit more fresh than using no mask at all, or even just a regular exfoliating cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Smells like Juicy Fruit, makes skin feel so smooth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this green gel makes my face feel so soft and smooth after washing and patting dry. I haven't found what it uses as physical exfoliant, I hope it's not plastic beads, but it's very fine and does not hurt, at the same time it feels very effective together with the enzymes like papain. I also like the smell, sort of like a vaguely herby, sweet Juicy Fruit smell. After my Play Box sample runs out, will consider buying full size. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. You can really feel it working and feel results after! Tingles intensely while on, rinses away to super soft, smooth skin. Smells like pumpkin spice, which was unexpected, but nice. I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's so nice after cleansing because of the fine texture it has. Leaves my skin really soft, and it feels like it works each and every time. TIP: Maybe try out the mini size because you don't need too much and you don't need to exfoliate all the time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the smallest size as a sample when I bought my Clarisonic. It lasted about 3 months using it 3X a week. It has really changed the texture of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A facialist recommended this to me to keep the results going at home, and it has more than delivered. I am prone to clogged pores on my nose and with one use of this, it gets to baby's butt levels of amazingness. My face does get red after use for the next hour or so, but as long as I don't have anywhere to be, it is well worth it! My skin is normally pretty sensitive, so I don't think the sensitive formula is needed for this product unless you either want something you can use and then go out after or you have super sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can not believe I havenu2019t reviewed this before! I talk about it all the time when anyone asks for skincare suggestions! This is one of my all time favorite products. I have combo acne prone skin and this really helps to tame it. I use this probably once a week (I have something else I also use once a week) and then I usually use some sort of clay mask afterward and itu2019s helped my skin a lot. Even when I only use this my skin is so much smoother and brighter and just over all better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While nothing shrinks large pores, this makes mine much less obvious. I apply a light layer in circular motions before I get out of the shower then leave it on while I brush my teeth. Another plus: cruelty free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Canu2019t live without this.  Feels amazing, smells amazing.  My skin can tolerate using it every 2-3 days.  The days I use it my makeup definitely goes on better and looks smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stopped feeling effective after a while.  So much so, I forgot I had it.  I would recommend using as directed and definitely giving it a shot. You will feel tingly and your skin a bit flushed but that goes away.

reviews.review_title: Great for pre-pimples and after popping!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love using this mask for acne. I only get the occasional pimple and when I do I use this and clears up everything! I also use this after I pop one to reduce redness and it works wonders! Sometimes Iu2019ll leave the treatment on longer for 2 min just to make it work for longer. Love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I initially tried this product some time last year because I got it for free with one of Sephorau2019s beauty offers. After finishing off the sample, my skin looked so much more smoother and brighter. I was hesitant to purchase this product again because of the price, but there are absolutely NO dupes for this product. The ingredients in this stuff is everything you need for soft, smooth, glowing, acne-free skin. This stuff worked 10x better than prescription retinol Iu2019ve used religiously in the past. The top two things that make this product so great is that it gives you visible results within a matter of days, and you only have to use it twice a week for a 2 minutes. It doesnu2019t get any easier than that! I do have normal to dry, sensitive skin, and I am able to use this product without any peeling or redness. This was well worth $85 and when I run out, Iu2019ll buy the 5 oz size. Itu2019ll last you quite sometime since you only use it twice a week. This stuff is worth every single penny!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i got a 1.7 oz sample in my Fabfitfun box and i dont like it it burns my skin and does not do much other than that for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Total game changer! I love using this a few times a week in the shower! It slightly warms up which made me a little nervous at first but I could not believe the difference in my skin after one use. My skin is combo in the tzone and pretty dry everywhere else. After using this my skin was so bright, pores tightened, and I had an incredible glow. I have started using the Kate glow moisturizer along with this and Iu2019ve seen such a big difference in my skin! Iu2019m going to buy the daily cleanser version of this next. Kate really is the guru of glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does anyone know if the formula changed my last 2 purchased didnu2019t have as much scrubbers as my previous purchase u2014 didnu2019t deep clean as much as it used tou2014 did they use micro beads?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best exfoliator ever! I couldnu2019t use this when I was pregnant but the second I had my kid, this was the first thing I grabbed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never left a review before and I am an avid Sephora shopper. This is by far my favorite item I use. My face glows after each us and I am 45. Itu2019s a must buy! Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff used to be my holy grail for beautiful, glowing, smooth skin. I would begrudgingly pay the insane price for this stuff because in my opinion it was worth it. I used it religiously for years. Then I bought a new tube recently and noticed that it didn't do anything for me. It took 2-3x as much product to spread on my face, and it didn't scrub or work half as well as normal. I emailed KS customer service and they informed me that yes, they had indeed changed the formula to be more environmentally friendly. The beads they were using were bad for the fish. So now, I will no longer purchase this because the formula is completely different and it is still $$$. The lady tried to tell me that the new formula is just as effective, bit it certainly is not. I'm very bummed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: firsts off, i have sensitive combo skin (more on the dry side). i bought this because i heard its one of the best exfoliators around!! and people were not kidding! the first time i used this (after i washed it off), i had white heads rising and my skin was so clean & it helped with extracting tough pimples i had easier!! iu2019ve used it 2 more times since and i believe this has helped with clearing up my skin for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells great, and it made my skin feel clean.  However, it's not much of an exfoliator.  It's very fine -- too gentle to smooth and polish skin, as it claims it will.  I used it every day for a week, and I saw no improvement in my skin texture or appearance of pores.  If you have super sensitive skin, this might be your product, but for me, it did nothing other than cleanse my skin.  I will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only skin care product that when I use it I can tell an immediate difference before and after. It's like it removes all the dinginess from my face. It appears smoother, even toned and bright. I absolutely love this stuff. Too bad it's so expensive...

reviews.review_title: Happy I have it a chance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this product being as great as the reviews say it is. Well, all the reviews are 100% accurate! I have used this four times in the last week and a half. I can already tell a difference in the appearance of my skin. Some of my lighter acne scars are starting to fade and my skin is extremely soft! I noticed that my foundation is starting to go on a lot better as well. I will be repurchasing when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have been using this exfoliater for at least 4 years with no problems. but i bought a new tube a month ago and i noticed the exfoliater was not as grainy and it made my face red after having it on for a minute. The redness only lasted about an hour but never had that reaction before. not sure if they changed the formula, it seemed different to me. be careful when you use this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a deluxe sample and used it 2x a week after washing my face in the shower. I had never used an acidic exfoliator since I have very sensitive skin, but it didnu2019t even tingle. It took me about a month for me to run out of my sample and thatu2019s when I really noticed the difference. I had made a few changes to my skincare so I wasnu2019t sure what was having the effect. It was definitely this! I was getting fewer hormonal breakout, less oil, my skin was smoother, less pores, and my acne scars were fading faster. Now I canu2019t live without it! There is a reason this is on every list and celebrities love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: in 22 years of wearing face products THE BEST exfoliation product ever to test. I have non sensitive skin and it went perfect with my complection. I tried first a sample and was awed by the results. Recomended it to two more friends and just waiting for them to let me know it wen as amazing for them as it did for me. A must have :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this exfoliating product! I do get a slight tingling sensation but Iu2019m guessing itu2019s from me having sensitive skin. It makes my face feel super soft and I can see my acne clearing up! The only downfall is itu2019s really expensive! :( but Iu2019d splurge just to have a clean fresh clear skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is magic!  So many compliments from my spouse.  Kate is not kidding when she says it makes your skin feel like a baby's.  It is a great product, and I am a convert!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in a quarterly beauty kit and m so glad I did, as the price would have been a deterrent. It is, upon usage, worth every penny! From the very first time I used it I could tell a difference. My skin was smoother, my pores seemed smaller, and my makeup went on flawlessly. Itu2019s definitely not an inexpensive product, but you only need to use a small dab, and only 2-3x a week, so it lasts quite a while! I received the middle size in November and I still have plenty left.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, scaly, sensitive skin. THERE. I SAID IT. I moisturize daily but there are times where my green color corrector looks like it's sitting on curled up pieces of pink confetti. Then add full coverage foundation and powder? Yes, I'm a gross mess. I tried this product and it felt like sandpaper going on but I fought back the crybaby tears and went on. (Remember? Alligator scales.) I left it on for only a minute because my skin is super sensitive and I didn't want to accidentally end up looking like Colossal Titan. I took it off and now I'm annoying everyone because I'm making everyone touch my super soft skin! This stuff works!

reviews.review_title: Holy Moly...will I get my skin back?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: first, I love this brands face cleaner and I'm almost done with my 2nd bottle so why not try this exfoilator? the first couple times I used it and nothing happened. My skin felt the same and I didn't break out. I just used this again a few days ago and my entire face feels like sandpaper! I don't leave this product on after I'm done gently rubbing because I do have sensitive skin. The first couple of uses there weren't any issues and now I feel like my face can go sand a clay pot. I have been trying to moisturize and I even used a Tatcha face mask but nothing is working. My foundation is just soaking into it and you can see all the rough patches all over my face. Seriously I have no idea what to do.

reviews.review_title: Helpful tip if you feel severe burning/irritation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So initially, I was able to relate to all/most of the 1-2 star reviews. I attempted to try this product several times and my face would ALWAYS burn and felt incredibly rough afterwards. I really wanted this product to work so I looked at some of the videos on how to best apply it (which should have been very simple...). But after watching these videos, I noticed how little of the product they use. It's really a pea-size, whereas I was using like the size of ten peas. So I tried using the size of a pea in the shower tonight and surprisingly, my face feels super smooth now! I somehow had the misunderstanding that more = better, but for this product, it seems that less = better. So, if you do happen to experience any burning, I would definitely try using less! Hope this helps. I'll update this review in case I notice any increase in sensitivity or burning sensation the next few times I use it. For the burners out there, hope this is a helpful tip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best exfoliater!!!!! the price is high but the result is worth it!!!!! I exfoliate my skin once a week because of my sensitive dry skin..i can actually feel my dead skin while rubbing it..also my face feels really soft Nd clean afterward..i would totally reccomend it..this is a staple to my routine.u2661u2661u2661

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Miracle worker, can't live without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin hasnu2019t looked this great since I had a spa day over a year ago! Twice a week?? Yes please!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of this stuff, which I got in my fall Fab Fit Fun box. I finally tried it a few weeks ago when the bitter Midwest cold really took a toll on my skin. I've been using once a week since then and have noticed more even, luminous skin. For background, I have combination skin with a very oily T-zone. I often have congested, blocked pores on my nose and between my brows. My cheeks and forehead get dry, especially in the winter. When I finally tried this stuff, my skin instantly felt smoothed out and balanced. You definitely need some good serum and moisturizer after this, but it really helped my skin. If you're sensitive or very dry, you might not respond well to this, but I was very pleasantly surprised. I'm hesitant to pay full price, but I imagine I'll end up doing it.

reviews.review_title: HOLY GRAIL! BUT THERE IS A TRICK TO THIS PRODUCT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got this as a sample..  And fell in love right away   After using this product for awhile I have found using it in the shower works the best.. I rub in circles with my finger(and I love the smell, very earthy and just overall good) then I'll let it sit on my skin while I shave or ect.. then wash off..  I have noticed a big difference with it and if I go without it I notice.. It's the first product I have ever not been able to live without!  Can't say enough good about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: I FORGOT HOW GREAT THIS IS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells good but it's not terribly effective. I got it as a sample but I wouldn't buy it. I need something stronger. But if you need something more mild, this may work well for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For background I have dry skin and wear a full coverage face everyday. I'm not dealing with any other issues beyond that. Based on that, a good exfoliation

reviews.review_title: L I F E S A V I N G
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a 0.25 oz sample and it was deep in my sample drawer for a while. I recently got a very bad reaction to something and got eczema-like dry skin. I had already made a dermatologist appointment and everything, when in a moment of desperation, I thought I'd try this. reviews.review_text: Way too small of a bottle for the price, and I didn't notice any difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Got it once in my play box. Will definitely buy and recommend!
It tingles a little and smells divine. It works at exfoliating and my skin ALWAYS looks healthier after a good scrub.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is most definitely expensive BUT does leave your skin so smooth. I got a small bottle in a Best of Sephora purchase, and I can't go without it anymore. I sometimes feel a litte tingle when I use it, but the results are just amazing. I haven't found anything that works as well as this. Unfortunately it comes with a high price tag, but a little goes a really long way. You only need about a pea sized amount each time. She smell was also really clean and the product is light weight. Pro Tip: leave it on for the recommended time! I'm testing the ExfoliKate Glow Moisturizer as part of a contest.
Love. My skin is absolutely so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was sent to me for free from influenster to review. I tried this product on in the shower and was surprised at just how powerful it was! It does have a slight tingling sensation but after I used this product my skin looked so clear and clean, and really helped with a breakout! Excited to use again.

reviews.review_title: LITERALLY FELT LIKE I HAD MODEL SKIN
reviews.review_text: I purchased this over a year ago and swear I have half the bottle still left over. I'm not a huge fan of physical exfoliation but this made me rethink everything. Legit felt like I had a full facial after using this. The amount of blackheads and texture on my face reduced drastically just after one use. HOW CRAZY IS THAT!! I'm so impressed by this & im so impressed with how much you get out of the tube. With that price though you should have a million applications. I don't want the day to come that I run out of it.
Amazing product, got it as part of my beauty points and use only as directed. Small tube, amazing results! Highly recommend
Great product! I loved how clean and smooth my skin felt after using!

This is MY GO-TO product! I use it every other day and leave it on for 2 minutes and BAM! Instant facial! The steam from the shower makes it all the more effective! When it comes to price, a little goes a long way with this product. By using small amounts of it, the product lasts pretty long!

I received this as a gift and I used it for the first time today, and WOW. I used probably a bit too much not knowing anything about it, and after I left it on for 2 minutes and washed it off, my nose was covered with extracted gunk from my pores!  I panicked a bit but took a toner on a cotton pad and wiped off all the gunk. My nose is so much smoother now that all the gunk in my pores was extracted. I'll keep using my bottle and may repurchase!

I got this as a free sample and tried it and got positive results, so I wanted more. I was happy that it came in a small tube because it is a bit pricey and I didn't want to be stuck with a large tube if it wasn't as great as I thought after one use. However, it was still amazing. I use it once a week. I only have to use a pea size amount so the small tube lasts a long time. After use, my face looks refreshed, glowing and awake. I love it. The onlly thing is that it is a strong product, so after use I only apply a moisturizer. No serum or anti-aging products, if you have sensitive skin. Also, don't leave it on longer than it says.

reviews.review_title: Sampled it Loved it Purchased it
reviews.review_text: I received this in my Play box and fell in love with it. The sample in the play box lasted me around five weeks (I only use it once a week and a little goes a long way). I just had to be it for me it is worth the investment. (Combo oily skin acne prone)

Bought a sample size during my last trip to Sephora and been using it for 3 weeks now! The first time I applied it, it did burn sooooo bad, I only left it on for 1 minute and after washing it off, I couldn't believe how soft and smooth my skin felt and looked!!! it didn't leave my skin red or irritated! I use it twice a week, and I still feel some burning first few seconds after applying it, but my skin just feels so soft after using it! If I get a pimple or so, it will peel off the top layer and I just apply spot acne treatment and my moisturizer after and in the morning it looks significantly better! Best exfoliating out there, no doubt!!!
Does a good job, Love it~
Love this stuff. I always have some in my shower. Rub it on and wait a few minutes and rinse it off. It leaves my skin so smooth.
